meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Humility</kanji> is <kanji>heavy</kanji>, so it's best nobody knows your secret. You should be <vocabulary>discreet</vocabulary> instead.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You just need to remember the alternative reading for 重. If you aren't discreet or careful, the evil Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう)will find you and kill you!
